definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: View the Sender field of the returned items.
sentences.chinese: 查看發件人字段的將退回的物料。

sentences.english: If you are not the intended recipient, please notify the sender immediately by returning this email and delete it from your system.
sentences.chinese: 如您誤收本郵件，請立即通知發件人並刪除本郵件。

sentences.english: For company shipper, this column should be filled with the name of the handler.
sentences.chinese: 如發件人爲公司，則此欄填寫具體經辦人的姓名。

sentences.english: If a letter is found to be undeliverable , it will be return to the sender.
sentences.chinese: 如果郵件無法投遞，將會退回給發件人。

sentences.english: Please notify us immediately when there is something unclear or page missing.
sentences.chinese: 若發現缺頁或內容不清，請速與發件人聯繫。
